feature: This is a fitness House . Here you can Selected your trainer for you fitness or you can become a trainer .

We added firebase authentication system , Here  for first time you become a member of fitness house , Then in the trainer page you can see all trainers , Also you are interested in become a trainer click on this page button become a trainer

A client or member can see trainer details it's a private route , So needed to login First , after logged in , you can see the trainer details , also if you interested in booked this trainer , click on available time slot button in trainer page. After available time slot clicking it will redirect  you in avaialble slot page , you will see three types of plan , you can see plan details by clicking plan details button , then you will see available slot and here you can booked this class with join now button
If any client or member booked any class , it will show in trainer dashboard manage slots page and a trainer can see all her/his member
A trainer can add new class from dashboard , also he/she can add new forum , here a trainer can send a  health related tips and tricks post
A member can see his/her daily activity's and some recoomanded class also he/she can send her feedback/story with fitness house
